Class Iteration2PurchaseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • iteration2.Iteration2PurchaseController

    public class Iteration2PurchaseController
extends java.lang.Object
implements PurchaseController
    The Class Iteration2PurchaseController. Implements @PurchaseController NOTE: There is a serious but in V0.3 for receptacle.notifyCoinsRemoved which is why there is an ugly workaround here
